Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1292 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-1292 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 1.1.1k-15, affected by CVE-2022-1292
